txt.en: 'Some of the children in the village seem a little bored this afternoon. I think they went to the mountain pond to play 'ducks and drakes'. Are you any good at that game? Well then, you should join them.'
Children can be found by the pond in the Rohan Eastfold Homesteads.\n\nYou should join the children in their 'ducks and drakes' game.
'How many skips was that?! I lost count!'
'That was the most skips I have ever seen!'

'Do you know how to play 'ducks and drakes'? I will teach you! Just pick up a stone, the flat smooth ones are the best, and throw it against the water like this. The one who scores the most bounces wins!'

'Do you know how to play 'ducks and drakes'? I will teach you! Just pick up a stone, the flat smooth ones are the best, and throw it against the water like this. The one who scores the most bounces wins!'
'Did your rock make it all the way across?!'
When neighbours work together, the Rohan Eastfold Homesteads will shine as bright as the beacons.
